ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: It will save you from a lot of pitfalls in pronunciation.Taking it early is important, because the instructor points out a lot of quite non-obvious issues and errors. If I did not address these issues as early, I doubt I would have been able to correct them later after they become a habit.
One of best English class I ever had. Yes.

The course will help you to be a little bit more prepared to start teaching. The focus is on pronunciation, but also vocabulary and teaching strategies are taken into consideration. I would recommend the course, although I think that a course more focused on teaching strategies rather than language skills would be more helpful.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It taught me about how to be a good TA
It does not contribute directly to my research, but it made me aware of an enormous number of pitfalls related speaking and presentation skills, that I would have missed otherwise.
It helps me a lot in my preparation for the coming teaching exam.

The course is not intended to deepen the knowledge of my own discipline. However it did help a little bit to improve my language and teaching skills, which I need during my graduate studies and later on for my profession.
